org.pipservices.components.log

Class CompositeLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.components.log.Logger
      • org.pipservices.components.log.CompositeLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.pipservices.commons.config.IConfigurable, org.pipservices.commons.config.IReconfigurable, org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferenceable, ILogger

    public class CompositeLogger
extends Logger
    Aggregates all loggers from component references under a single component. It allows to log messages and conveniently send them to multiple destinations. ### References ### - *:logger:*:*:1.0 (optional) ILogger components to pass log messages

    ### Example ### 

     
 class MyComponent implements IConfigurable, IReferenceable {
     CompositeLogger _logger = new CompositeLogger();
 
     public void configure(ConfigParams config) {
        this._logger.configure(config);
        ...
     }
 
     public void setReferences(IReferences references) {
         this._logger.setReferences(references);
         ...
     }
 
     public void myMethod(String correlationId) {
         this._logger.debug(correlationId, "Called method mycomponent.mymethod");
         ...
     }
 }
    See Also:
    ILogger

        Writes a log message to the logger destination(s).

        Parameters:
        level - a log level.
